post.description: This endpoint will make an asynchronous request to refresh the Operator Connect integration with Microsoft Teams for the current user. This will create new external connections on the user's account if needed, and/or report the integration results as [log messages](https://developers.telnyx.com/api/external-voice-integrations/list-external-connection-log-messages).

success.description: Describes wether or not the operation was successful

message.description: A message describing the result of the operation
